subject: FBI Headquarters in Washingt
body:
FBI Headquarters in Washington, D.C.
J. Edgar Hoover Buildings
935 Pennsylvania Avenue, NW
Washington, D.C. 20535-0001
Dear Beneficiary,
Good news for you from the Federal Bureau of Investigation {FBI) United States of America. We had a meeting with International Monetary Fund and Federal Government of Nigeria/ Benin over your long overdue contract /inheritance payment, We finally reached an agreement yesterday that all the payment will be paid via ATM smart card which is the simplest way to release a huge amount of money to avoid cost of transfer and other Statutory Documents, which we stretched to have a strong agreement over the payment that will cost you only $95 USD for delivery of your ATM smart card via Ups or Fedex delivery company depending on your choice.
However, you have only two working days to Comply with this required delivery fee of $95 USD for Fedex or Ups Courier Company for delivery of your card because your card will be dispatched to them immediately. And if we don't get a positive response from you in regards; the Federal Bureau of Investigation will not hesitate by giving instruction to the Federal Government of Nigeria and the International Remittance Department to cancel your approved payment that has been programmed.
Please read carefully, the notice below stands as a caution before it is late. For your consideration, you must be conscious of this project. Be informed that you may also receive several emails or telephone calls from any organization; such must be forwarded to me for verification. It might come to you with different proposals including my name asking you for a claim or even funds belonging to you or to somebody you do not know, i urge you to ignore such emails or calls.
I want your understanding and cooperation. While responding to the ATM card payment officer you must confirm this code (18062010) for identification. be informed that the part payment, which is $3,000.000.00 Million U.S. Dollars have been loaded in your ATM smart card and your fund which is in tune of 10,500.000.00 Million U.S. Dollars will come in batches of $3,000.000.00 Million U.S. Dollars and this is the first batch of your part payment. Your payment would be sent to you via Ups or FedEx; because we have signed a contract with them which should expire by December 31, 2023.
These are people that received their payment through Fedex and UPS Website (http:/ /www.fedex.com/).
JOHNNY ALMANAC ====================1Z2X59394198080570
GARY METIER =========================1Z2X59394195952759
GLEN PAPAYAS ========================1Z2X59394198690947
CAROL R BUCKSKIN ====================1Z2X59394197862530
KARMA EMELIA TAYLOR ================1Z2X59394198591527
LISA LAIRD ===========================1Z2X59394196641913
POLLY SHAY KIN =======================1Z2X59394198817702
RICHARD AUDRY ==============869713119185
GARY METIER ==============871363130860
MARK STUBBY ==============871363116168
Be advised based on recommendation/instructions that your contract/inheritance over-due funds will be released upon your contact to the newly appointed payment officer that will carry out the dispatch of your ATM smart card to the courier company with the payment for delivery of your package. You are therefore advised to contact Rev James v. Solomon immediately as stated below as the appointed director of ATM Smart Card/Foreign Operation Dept and ask him on how and where to send the payment of $95 USD only to Fedex or Ups Courier Company.
CONTACT PERSON: Rev James V. Solomon
The New Executive Director In-charge Foreign Payment, Central Bank of Nigeria
CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA TINUBU SQUARE LAGOS (CBN)
EMAIL ADDRESS:  
solomonrevjamesv@gmail.com
WHATSAPP DIRECT TEL +234-9033889114 or
Tel + 234- 9077039579
Kindly contact Rev James V. Solomon so as to enable him facilitate a speedy process and release of your ATM Card with the following information below:
1. YOUR FULL NAME............................................................
2. CONTACT ADDRESS .........................................................
3. YOUR AGE........................................................................
4. OCCUPATION....................................................................
5. PHONES AND FAX NUMBER.............................................
6. COUNTRY..........................................................................
7. YOUR  ID...........................................................................
You are also expected to follow his advice and directives to avoid delay in releasing your ATM Card.
Congratulations.
Yours In Service,
Director
Christopher A. Wray
Federal Bureau of Investigation
United States Department of Justice
Washington, D.C. 20535

subject: Re:   FBI Headquarters in Washingt
body:
Dear Director A. Wray,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I appreciate the update regarding my long overdue contract payment. The option of receiving the payment via an ATM smart card sounds interesting.

I just have a few questions before proceeding. Could you please provide more details about the process of receiving the ATM smart card? How long does it usually take for the card to be delivered? Also, what are the security measures in place to ensure that the funds on the card are protected?

Additionally, I noticed that you mentioned some individuals who have already received their payments through FedEx and UPS. Is there any way I can verify their experiences or get in touch with them to hear about their firsthand experiences?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Robert

subject: Re: FBI Headquarters in Washingt
body:
From: Rev. James V. Solomon

Dear Robert

Thank you for contacting me as directed by (FBI) Director Christopher Wray.
You are advised to pay the SHIPPING FEE cost of USD$95 via Ria, MoneyGram
or World Remit money transfer service with the following information, so
that you will have your ATM SMART CARD within 72 hours.

Recipient Name: Prince Celestine Silva
Recipient Address: 21 Odo Street Obalende Lagos Nigeria
Telephone number: +234-9033889114

Rest assured of delivery once USD$95 is paid your ATM card will proceed on
Monday, which will take 72 hours to reach your address . I hope to receive
the payment of USD$95 as soon as possible to allow the courier company to
continue with Delivery. of your ATM SMART CARD immediately.

Yours sincerely,

Rev. James V Solomon

subject: Re: FBI Headquarters in Washingt
body:
Dear Rev. James Solomon,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the delivery of my ATM SMART CARD. I appreciate your assistance in this matter. However, I have a few questions before proceeding with the payment.

1. Could you please provide more details about the shipping fee? How much is it exactly and what does it cover?

2. Which courier company will be handling the delivery of my ATM card? Can you provide me with their contact information or website so that I can verify their legitimacy?

3. Is there any tracking number or reference number associated with my package? It would be helpful to have that information for future reference.

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how to proceed with the payment.

Best wishes,
Robert

subject: Re: FBI Headquarters in Washingt
body:
From: Rev. James V. Solomon

Dear Robert

First you have to make the payment as instructed of you and once the money
is available i will proceed with the delivery of the ATM Card with FedEx or
DHL Courier Company  Please bear in mind that your representative here in
Nigeria so it is my duty to work accordingly and ensure the ATM Card is
delivered to your nominated address which you are to provide and also I am
going to obtain a Certificate of Ownership in your favor name and as a
beneficiary whose ATM Card is assigned to. I will advise you to provide the
following information below:

*1. Your Full Name:*
*2. Your receiving Address:*
*3. Direct Telephone or WhatsApp Number:*
*4. Occupation:*

Once the payment is made and the delivery proceeds, I will send you the
tracking number of the package for you to track your delivery until it
takes to your nominated address therein. Kindly proceed with the payment
with below info:



*Recipient Name: Prince Celestine SilvaRecipient Address: 21 Odo Street
Obalende Lagos NigeriaTelephone number: +234-9033889114*

Yours sincerely,

Rev. James V Solomon

subject: Re: FBI Headquarters in Washingt
body:
Dear Rev. James Solomon,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your assistance in delivering the ATM card to my nominated address. However, before I proceed with the payment, I have a few questions regarding the process.

1. Could you please provide more details about the payment method? Is it through a bank transfer or any other secure means?

2. What is the total amount that needs to be paid for the delivery of the ATM card?

3. Are there any additional fees or charges that I should be aware of apart from the delivery cost?

4. How long will it take for the ATM card to be delivered once the payment is made?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how to proceed.

Best wishes,
Robert

subject: Re: FBI Headquarters in Washingt
body:
From: Rev. James V. Solomon

Dear Robert

The  payment method is via Ria, MoneyGram or WorldRemit and the $95 Dollars
is the amount asked for the delivery once paid your ATM Card will arrive to
you within 72 hours. Know additional payment.



*Recipient Name: Prince Celestine SilvaRecipient Address: 21 Odo Street
Obalende Lagos NigeriaTelephone number: +234-9033889114*

Yours sincerely,

Rev. James V Solomon

subject: Re: FBI Headquarters in Washingt
body:
Dear Rev. James Solomon,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you provided about the payment method and the delivery process for the ATM card. However, I have a few follow-up questions before proceeding.

1. Could you please provide more details about Ria? Is it a reliable and secure payment method?

2. What is the total amount required for the delivery of the ATM card? Are there any additional fees or charges that I should be aware of?

3. Can you confirm if Prince Celestine is the authorized recipient for this transaction? I want to ensure that everything is legitimate and secure.

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Robert
